data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Butel, North Macedonia know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Butel, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 60 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Butel.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 603 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Butel, North Macedonia to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Butel, North Macedonia.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Albanian, Macedonian people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Butel, North Macedonia. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Butel access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.section_summary:
the state of Butel, North Macedonia has a population of 36,200.

We estimate Butel has 60 people who might know Jesus, 22,374 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 13,766 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 603 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Butel, North Macedonia.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.
